history.proof: exists f. intro p. unfold BSM_HALTING, MM_HALTS_ON_ZERO. sauto depth: 3.

original: intros. exists f. intro p. unfold BSM_HALTING, MM_HALTS_ON_ZERO. intros P. destruct P as [[n s] [i s0]]. destruct s0 as [P0 v]. simpl. split. - intro. exists (bsm_mm_compiler_2 i P0). apply existT with (n:=2+n). apply existT with (b:=existT _ (vec_map stack_enc v)). auto. - intros [n s]. destruct s as [P0 v]. intros _. exists (linker 1). exists (bsm_mm_compiler_2 i P0). exists (0 ## 0 ## vec_map stack_enc v). auto.
